text: Lars Edvin Folke Ryding, (born 4 February 2003) is a Swedish actor. He debuted in the TV series Mannen under trappan in 2009. Since then Ryding has acted in several other productions like Fröken Frimans krig, Kronjuvelerna, The Stig- Helmer Story, Gåsmamman, Nobels testamente, and several of the filme about Annika Bengtzon produced in 2011.Här är rollerna svt.se Retrieved 12 July 2019 He had the leading voice role in the Danish childrens animated film Resan till Fjäderkungens rike. ==Filmography== *2009 – Mannen under trappan (TV series) *2011 – The Stig-Helmer Story *2011 – Kronjuvelerna *2012 – Nobels testamente *2012 – Prime Time *2012 – Studio Sex *2012 – Den röda vargen *2012 – Livstid *2012 – En plats i solen *2013 – Resan till Fjäderkungens rike (voice) *2013 – IRL *2013 – Biciklo - Supercykeln (TV series) *2013–2016 – Fröken Frimans krig (TV series) *2014 – Resan till Fjäderkungens rike *2014 – Herr Peabody & Sherman (voice) *2014 – Paddington (voice) *2015 – Jönssonligan – Den perfekta stöten *2015-2019 - Gåsmamman (TV-series) *2015 – Om allt vore på riktigt *2016 – Kubo och de två strängarna (voice) *2017 – Paddington 2 (voice) *2018 – Storm på Lugna gatan (TV series) (Christmas calendar) *2019 - Älska mig (TV- series) *2020 - Framåt (Onward) (Voice) *2020 - High School Musical - the Musical - the Series (voice) *2020 - Doctor DoLittle (voice) *2020 - Älska mig 2 (TV-series) ==References== Category:Living people Category:2003 births Category:Swedish actors Category:People from Stockholm
title: Edvin Ryding
